heading: klelb34
title: innovation
text:
Innovation is a crucial driver of progress and competitiveness in today's fast-paced world.Here are some key insights and strategies from recent articles on innovation:

1. **Strategic Alignment**: Companies often treat their innovation projects as a portfolio, aiming for a mix that meets strategic objectives. A new approach suggests using a strategy summary framework and an innovation basket to better align projects with company goals².

2. **Characteristics of Successful Innovators**: Contrary to popular belief, successful innovators are not always lone geniuses or big-risk takers. They often exhibit traits like curiosity, resilience, and the ability to collaborate effectively¹.

3. **Breakthrough vs. Incremental Innovation**: While many companies excel at making incremental improvements, achieving breakthrough innovation requires a different approach. This involves fostering a culture that encourages experimentation and tolerates failure¹.

4. **Execution of Innovation Initiatives**: Execution is often the most challenging part of innovation. Best practices include clear goal setting, resource allocation, and continuous monitoring and adjustment of projects¹.

5. **Innovation in Design**: Physical space can significantly impact innovation. For example, better hospital design can reduce pain, lower costs, and save lives by creating environments that promote healing¹.

These insights highlight the multifaceted nature of innovation and the importance of aligning it with strategic goals, fostering the right culture, and executing effectively.

If you're interested in a specific aspect of innovation or need more detailed information, feel free to ask!

Source: Conversation with Copilot, 27/9/2024
(1) A New Approach to Strategic Innovation - Harvard Business Review. https://hbr.org/2023/09/a-new-approach-to-strategic-innovation.
(2) Innovation - HBR - Harvard Business Review. https://hbr.org/topic/subject/innovation.
(3) 12 Most Popular Articles on Innovation in 2021 - Inside Outside. https://insideoutside.io/12-most-popular-articles-on-innovation-in-2021/.
(4) 12 Essential Innovation Insights - MIT Sloan Management Review. https://sloanreview.mit.edu/article/12-essential-innovation-insights/.
(5) Innovation Strategy: Articles, Research, & Case Studies on Innovation .... https://hbswk.hbs.edu/Pages/browse.aspx?HBSTopic=Innovation%20Strategy.
(6) en.wikipedia.org. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Innovation.
